page.title: 14FARMING : Changes
page.content: {Easter Balrymonth Farm In the past twenty years there have been great changes on this farm. It has become far more mechanised with the result that fewer people are needed to man the farm. Twenty years ago it employed five workers and now can be managed by one.They do, however, need extra helpers during the busiest time of the year. With increased mechanisation making farm work quicker,the farm could become larger and thus more profitable. Not only do machines help, but the introduction of pesticides and fertilisers can double and even treble the crop yields. Crops are constantly changing with better breeds being introduced as well as new crops,such as oil seed rape and peas which have been grown on the farm in the last five years.
